text: Neil Fanning (born 12 April 1967) is an Australian actor, safety supervisor, stuntman and voice artist. He is best known for voicing the titular character in the live-action movie adaptation Scooby-Doo and its sequel Scooby-Doo 2: Monsters Unleashed. Fanning's entertainment career has spanned over 30 years performing live shows and over 50 movie, commercial and television roles. == Other websites == * * Neil Fanning on Behind The Voice Actors Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Brisbane Category:Australian voice actors
title: Neil Fanning
